attributes.action: Suspend NATO's Article 5 until a reasonable UK-EU trade deal is agreed.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK finds itself in the position of being the 2nd largest guarantor of security of Europe whilst being attacked by the same EU & national leaders we are protecting. 

They are seeking to drive the financial sector from London to Paris & Frankfurt, refusing a deal unless a tax of £60bil is paid, annual tax payments, threats to our fishing zones, a refusal to give UK nationals security of tenure in the EU
These are not the acts of "Allies" but an attempt to punish us for our democratic choice
attributes.background: We ask the UK Gov to suspend the blank cheque assurance given to the Euro nations of our commitment to come to their aid under NATOs Article 5. Also to pull all troops, naval ships, military & financial support from any Euro nation until a mutually beneficial trade/travel deal is reached with the EU
